dt.t: They watch a middle-aged man pedal by on his {wi}bike{/wi}, the carrier filled to the brim with its own pile of collectables.
More than 100,000 motorcyclists are expected to descend on tiny Sturgis, S.D., this week for the annual Black Hills Motor Classic, the country's biggest {wi}bike{/wi} rally.

Yes, those are motorbikes racing around an ice track. No, that doesn't mean you should take your motorbike out on some ice and ride as fast as you can. These ice racers are serious. They modify their {wi}bikes{/wi} to perform on the slippery surface provided by the great Michigan outdoors.

It's four in the morning and DeBartolo is already whirring away on the exercise {wi}bike{/wi}. He'll ride and read for 90 minutes without stopping, then hit the rowing machine, then the stair-climber.

dt: {bc}a nest of wild bees, wasps, or hornets

shortdef: a nest of wild bees, wasps, or hornets
a crowd or swarm of people

dt: {bc}a usually lightweight motorcycle designed for operation on unpaved surfaces

shortdef: a usually lightweight motorcycle designed for operation on unpaved surfaces

dt: {bc}a bicycle equipped with an electric motor that may be activated in order to assist with or replace pedaling

dt.t: Just like any bike, {wi}electric bikes{/wi} come with a ton of different technical specs that you may or may not care about.

For many years, {wi}e-bikes{/wi} carried the stigma of being vehicles for lazy pedalers and seniors. The bikes draw power from a battery and motor to make pedaling significantly easier. You can also accelerate with the press of a button, transforming cycling from a strenuous exercise into a joy ride.

shortdef: a bicycle equipped with an electric motor that may be activated in order to assist with or replace pedaling

dt: {bc}an all-terrain bicycle with wide knobby tires, straight handlebars, and typically 18 to 21 gears

shortdef: an all-terrain bicycle with wide knobby tires, straight handlebars, and typically 18 to 21 gears

dt: {bc}a ski lift that holds four people
{bc}a jump (as in figure skating or skiing) that consists of at least four but less than five revolutions

dt.t: Last month Leaver announced that Boitano would not try the jump for which he is best known, the quadruple {d_link|toe loop|toe loop}, at the Olympics. Never performed successfully in competition, the {wi}quad{/wi} has become the slippery grail of skating.

shortdef: a ski lift that holds four people
a jump (as in figure skating or skiing) that consists of at least four but less than five revolutions

dt: {bc}a small motorcycle designed for off-road use

shortdef: a small motorcycle designed for off-road use
